text: Council Julian Dunbar Jr. (August 4, 1922 - September 14, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was in the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1971 to 1972, representing Allendale County, South Carolina. He was an insurance agent. Dunbar Jr. was born in Martin, South Carolina. Dunbar Jr. died on September 14, 2020 at the age of 98.Council Julian Dunbar Jr.'s obituary ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Businesspeople from South Carolina Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Council Julian Dunbar Jr.
